comment.author: 85162154@N03
comment._content: My teacher of Mandarin school shanghai( www.mandarininn.cn/ ) asked me wrote a poem about the light , so I wrote that : The cricket's chirp and the patter of rain come to me through the dark, like the rustle of dreams from my past youth.
